rajawali.parser

Class LoaderSTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.parser.ALoader
      • rajawali.parser.AMeshLoader
        • rajawali.parser.LoaderSTL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILoader, IMeshLoader

    public class LoaderSTL
extends AMeshLoader
    STL Parser written using the ASCII format as describe on Wikipedia.

    Author:
    Ian Thomas (toxicbakery@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/STL_(file_format)

      • readASCII

        private void readASCII(java.io.BufferedReader buffer)
                throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Read stream as ASCII. While this works well, ASCII is painfully slow on mobile devices due to tight memory constraints and lower processing power compared to desktops. It is advisable to use the binary parser whenever possible.
        Parameters:
        buffer -
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
        java.io.IOException

      • readBinary

        private void readBinary(LittleEndianDataInputStream dis)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Read stream as binary STL. This is significantly faster than ASCII parsing. Additionally binary files are much more compressed allowing smaller file sizes for larger models compared to ASCII.
        Parameters:
        dis -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
